page.title: 06A typical house in the area
page.content: Hollytree Cottage, in Barton Road,{Barton}has been extended and extensively repaired over the past four years. The main cottage is stone built and has a rough cast appearance. Great care has been taken to preserve the character of the interior. Particular features of the cottage are two fine inglenook fireplaces in the living and sitting rooms. The cottage is approached through a large front garden, which is laid to grass. On the southern side of the property there is a large vegetable plot and a small stone and tiled pigsty with run. Beyond this is a large orchard with mature and young apple and pear trees. Offered for sale at{Â£72,000.
